testcase.name: Theme Switching Default Theme Behavior should have a theme attribute set
testcase.classname: should have a theme attribute set

testcase.name: Theme Switching Default Theme Behavior should store theme in localStorage
Theme Switching Default Theme Behavior should apply default theme on first visit
testcase.classname: should apply default theme on first visit

testcase.name: Theme Switching Theme Toggle Functionality should handle theme toggle functionality
Theme Switching Theme Toggle Functionality should persist theme across page reloads
testcase.classname: should persist theme across page reloads

testcase.name: Theme Switching Theme Toggle Functionality should handle invalid theme values gracefully
testcase.classname: should handle invalid theme values gracefully

testcase.name: Theme Switching Theme in Auth Pages should apply theme to auth pages
testcase.classname: should apply theme to auth pages

testcase.name: Theme Switching Theme in Auth Pages should maintain consistent theme across auth pages
testcase.classname: should maintain consistent theme across auth pages

testcase.name: Theme Switching Theme in Auth Pages should handle theme switching on register page
testcase.classname: should handle theme switching on register page

testcase.name: Theme Switching Theme and Form Interaction should maintain form functionality across themes
testcase.classname: should maintain form functionality across themes

failure.message:
Timed out retrying after 8000ms: `cy.type()` failed because this element:
`<input _ngcontent-ng-c2697436786="" id="loginEmail" data-testid="email" data-cy="email-input" type="email" formcontrolname="email" autocomplete="username" ng-reflect-name="email" aria-invalid="false" class="ng-untouched ng-pristine ng-invalid">`
is being covered by another element:
`<iframe id="webpack-dev-server-client-overlay" src="about:blank" style="position: fixed; inset: 0px; width: 100vw; height: 100vh; border: none; z-index: 2147483647;"></iframe>`
Fix this problem, or use {force: true} to disable error checking.
https://on.cypress.io/element-cannot-be-interacted-with
